fields.name: Filter
fields.description: Specifies the filter condition for the 'where' clause which will be run on main query's result, just before the actual faceting.

fields.name: SortBy
fields.description: The column name or query expression to sort on. Defaults to count if not present.

fields.name: SortOrder
fields.description: The sorting order by the selected column (count by default).

fields.name: Top
fields.description: The maximum number of facet rows that should be returned.
